about_the_game:
Intergalactic Defenders is an action-packed, single-player arcade shooter that combines the thrill of rogue-like progression with the nostalgia of classic space combat games. Set in the year 2187, this game takes you on a journey through the cosmos, where the fate of humanity rests in your hands.

As one of the United Planetary Alliance's most skilled pilots, you're tasked with defending humanity's colonies against the sudden and merciless attacks of the alien Caedons. With each mission, you'll navigate through procedurally generated levels, ensuring a unique and challenging experience every time you play.

  • Thrilling Space Combat: Experience the rush of engaging in high-stakes battles against a formidable alien foe.

  • Retro-Inspired Pixel Art: Dive into beautifully crafted, pixel art levels that pay homage to classic arcade shooters.

  • Handcrafted Levels: Explore a variety of uniquely designed levels, each offering distinct challenges and story elements.

  • Engaging Storyline: Uncover a compelling narrative that unfolds as you journey through the galaxy, defending humanity against the Caedon threat.

  • Ship Upgrades and Customization: Enhance your spacecraft with a range of weapons and gadgets, tailoring your arsenal to your playstyle.

  • Strategic Gameplay: Make pivotal decisions in battles and missions that influence the outcome of the war against the Caedons.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or newer
  • Processor: Intel or AMD Dual Core CPU
  • Memory: 250 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 5500, GeForce 720,or Radeon HD 5570
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or newer
  • Processor: Intel i7
  • Memory: 250 MB RAM
  • Graphics: (Integrated): Intel HD Graphics or AMD (formerly ATI) Radeon HD Graphics (Discrete): Nvidia GeForce GTX 760 (or greater) or AMD Radeon HD 7600 (or greater)
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

short_description: A fast-paced single-player arcade shooter, 'Intergalactic Defenders' combines strategic rogue-like elements with classic space combat, where you, as an elite pilot, engage in thrilling battles to save humanity from the alien Caedons.
